meanings.definition: Not relying on others for financial support.
meanings.sent1: She is a nondependent individual who manages her own finances.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to be nondependent and earn his own money.
meanings.sent3: The nondependent woman budgeted her expenses wisely.
meanings.sent4: His nondependent nature shines through in his ability to save.
meanings.sent5: Being nondependent financially gives her a sense of freedom.

meanings.sent1: He is proud to be nondependent and free from any addiction.
meanings.sent2: She has been nondependent on any substances for years.
meanings.sent3: The nondependent man enjoys a clean and healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: Living nondependent from substances has improved his well-being.
meanings.sent5: Choosing to be nondependent on drugs was the best decision he made.

meanings.definition: Not requiring the presence or help of others.
meanings.sent1: The nondependent child confidently completed the task on his own.
meanings.sent2: She is a nondependent worker who can handle projects independently.
meanings.sent3: The nondependent student impressively solved the problem solo.
meanings.sent4: His nondependent attitude allows him to work efficiently without assistance.
meanings.sent5: Being nondependent makes her feel empowered and capable.
